channel.title: Looking for a [Client,Server Developer] 614+ - Paying btw
channel.description:
[size=10pt]BEFORE YOU READ ON ONLY APPLY IF YOU HAVE EXPERIENCE AS WELL AS EXCEPTIONAL TALENT.
Am looking at starting a RSPS which will involve PVP as well as an economy.
I have a budget of $1,000 for gold banners , advertisement fee's and a VPS I am aiming to get this server in to the top 5 RSPS's and am utmost dedicated towards this project.
To achieve my aims I need the best of the best and now am asking you please do "NOT" reply or add my skype if you have no idea on how to code it's really starting to bug me!
Some stuff which I'd be looking at having on the server.
Donator area. Yell - Donators Vote point system 100% staking (duel arena) 100% working prayer - mage 100% matching armour stats (Runescape) Donator shop insisting of (Torva , pernix , spirit shields etc) Loyalty points (donator) Maybe a bit of PVM if your interested in adding it. Working friends chat Working private messaging Effects and GFX near to Runescape as possible Loyalty title Dice ranks Nex - Also in original Nex room if possible.
Note: am not interested in custom items etc.
Basically looking to create an inspirational RSPS.
PRICES : Dippends on how good you can develop a server, but the prices will be good for how good work you do.
Note : if you become a partner with me I will fund all advertisement , VPS fees until donations can take care of it.
I want to see proof of your previous work so I know am not hiring a complete and utter idiot.
You must be experienced with exceptional talent.
Now please don't pm me or add my skype if you can only code basic servers.
Pm me or add my skype "ohKaizen" or "tom.popplestone"
Thanks, Era and Tom.[/size]

item.title: Looking for a [Client,Server Developer] 614+ - Paying btw
item.dc:creator: @skat3rboy21 skat3rboy21
item.description:
@skat3rboy21 wrote:

Hi EraHere,

I"m a Graphic Designer. I been Designing for about 4 or 5 years now I had alot of compliments.

  • Applying for: Forum Designer and GFX Designer.
  • here’s my work: Light-Up.TK
    Forums: http://codexrsps.tk/ go to Forums tab

Pm me or email me as soon as possible
Contact information below
MSN: skat3rboy4@hotmail.com
Thank You

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a [Client,Server Developer] 614+ - Paying btw

item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

EraHere:

$1000 for vps/advertisements/forums development fees/ ect

still. Who the hell would spend 1k on a RSPS. I’ve seen very successful ones that started out with $10-$20 max.
